div.head: Report:
div.p: The structure of a totally recombinant nucleosome core particle containing the octamer of core histone proteins H2A, H2B, H3, and H4, and a 146 bp DNA has been solved by X-ray crystallography at 2.8 A resolution. Enclosed please find a reprint of the structure description which appeared in the 18 September, 1997 issue of Nature (389,251).

The refinement of the structure at 2.0 A using the data collected on BL3 is in progress. Unfortunately, the person who was most involved in the structure refinement left the laboratory unexpectedly delaying our progress. We hope to finish with work midway in 1998.
